egov-security:config.jdbcUsersByUsernameQuery: SELECT USER_ID, USER_ID AS PASSWORD, 1 ENABLED, USER_NM, '-' ORGNZT_NM FROM IPD_MBER WHERE USER_ID = ?
egov-security:config.jdbcAuthoritiesByUsernameQuery: SELECT A.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID USER_ID, A.AUTHOR_CODE AUTHORITY FROM IPD_MBER_AUTHOR A, IPD_MBER B WHERE A.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.USER_ID = ?

egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlHierarchicalRoles: SELECT a.CHLDRN_ROLE child, a.PARNTS_ROLE parent FROM IPD_ROLES_HIERARCHY a LEFT JOIN IPD_ROLES_HIERARCHY b on (a.CHLDRN_ROLE = b.PARNTS_ROLE)
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRolesAndUrl: SELECT a.ROLE_PTTRN url, b.AUTHOR_CODE authority FROM IPD_ROLE a, IPD_AUTHOR_ROLE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'url' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRolesAndMethod: SELECT a.ROLE_PTTRN method, b.AUTHOR_CODE authority FROM IPD_ROLE a, IPD_AUTHOR_ROLE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'method' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRolesAndPointcut: SELECT a.ROLE_PTTRN pointcut, b.AUTHOR_CODE authority FROM IPD_ROLE a, IPD_AUTHOR_ROLE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'pointcut' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRegexMatchedRequestMapping: SELECT a.resource_pattern uri, b.authority authority FROM IPD_ROLE a, IPD_AUTHOR_ROLE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'regex' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
